title: Looking for an ADC Coach/Mentor
body:
Hello community, and yes, as the title says, I'm looking for an ADC coach/mentor. 

I'm currently sitting at Silver 4 on my main. But have decided to level up another account (this one)

Wondering if there was anyone out there would be interested in coaching me! (Might be $ involved)

I've played every ADC at least a few times.. But I currently play/main Jinx {{champion:222}} & Lucian. {{champion:236}} (but will learn others)

I'm not complete trash, but then again, I am only silver.. so make your own judgements xD

Feel free to add me and we'll talk more :) - "Axanthic"

replies.body: I'd be happy to help when I'm free if you add me in game (Kathmandu). I don't play a whole lotta ranked due to real life commitments, but I'm currently plat 5 and can offer you a lot of insight in bot lane game knowledge and specific champion mechanics. I main adc and tend to duo with my support main friend so he can probably offer you some tips too.

Do you have any known issues or problems? Like stuff that happens regularly that you don't know if you're doing well.

I don't play ranked these days but have been playing the game since the beta quite regularly, so I'm happy to offer some free advice. In terms of ADCs I normally play Quinn or Jinx, but I play someone different every game. :P
Do you have any known issues or problems? Like stuff that happens regularly that you don't know if you're doing well.
